name: godoxy
description: Godoxy is a self-hosted proxy server designed for inspecting HTTP traffic and debugging. It provides a web interface and API for logging requests, useful for development and debugging processes.
features: Traffic Inspection: Intercept and examine HTTP requests and responses in real-time.
Request Logging: Capture detailed logs of all HTTP traffic passing through the proxy.
Web Interface: View and analyze traffic through a browser-based dashboard.
Debugging Proxy: Identify issues in API calls, webhooks, and HTTP integrations.
Header Analysis: Inspect request and response headers for troubleshooting.
Body Viewing: Examine request and response bodies including JSON, XML, and form data.
API Testing: Test API endpoints by modifying requests before forwarding to backends.
Development Workflow: Essential tool for debugging web applications and services.
